code: import{ACTION_TYPE}from'../actions';const initialPostState={id:'',title:'',imageUrl:'',content:'',publishedAt:'',comments:[]};export const postReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialPostState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ACTION_TYPE.SET_POST_DATA:return{...state,...action.payload};case ACTION_TYPE.RESET_POST_DATA:return initialPostState;default:return state;}};
